markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Hummingbird](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1498)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Hummingbird](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1498)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 39</row>

**Perception** +27; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +26, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +23 

**Ref** +24 

**Will** +23 

</row>

**HP** 260

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +24 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-handed 3d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 3d4+9 bludgeoning

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 35, attack +27
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
- **2nd**
[Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136) (×2), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175)
- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=167) (×2), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **4th**
[Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=102), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) (×2)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23) (×2), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)
- **6th**
[Baleful Polymorph](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), [Barkskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123), [Moon Frenzy](/Spells.aspx?ID=203)
- **7th**
[Elemental Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=98), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Unfettered Pack](/Spells.aspx?ID=350)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The transmuter becomes a Medium [air elemental](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=41) or returns to her gnoll form. As an elemental, she has a fly Speed of 60 feet, her movement doesn't trigger reactions, and the only Strike she can make is an [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) gust Strike (which deals 3d8+5 bludgeoning damage plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20)). She can't cast spells in this form.

**Drain Bonded Item** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** The transmuter hasn't acted yet on this turn; **Effect** During this turn, the transmuter can cast one prepared spell she has already cast, without spending a spell slot.

</column>
name: Hummingbird

text: Hummingbird Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 41 Unspecific Lore : DC 39 Specific Lore : DC 36 Hummingbird Source Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight! pg. 39 Perception +27; darkvision Languages Common, Draconic, Gnoll, Mwangi Skills Athletics +26, Arcana +26 Str +3 Dex +3 Con +4 Int +5 Wis +2 Cha +0 Items +2 greater striking staff --- AC 31 Fort +23 Ref +24 Will +23 HP 260 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action staff +24 (Magical, two-handed 3d8), Damage 3d4+9 bludgeoning Arcane Prepared Spells DC 35, attack +27 - Cantrips (7th) Detect Magic, Electric Arc, Light, Produce Flame, Shield - 1st Fear, Fleet Step, True Strike, Unseen Servant - 2nd Glitterdust (×2), Invisibility, Longstrider - 3rd Haste, Jump (×2), Slow - 4th Enlarge, Heal, Fly (×2) - 5th Black Tentacles (×2), Heal, Tongues - 6th Baleful Polymorph, Barkskin, Flesh to Stone, Moon Frenzy - 7th Elemental Form, Haste, Unfettered Pack Change Shape Single Action (Concentrate, Polymorph, Primal, Transmutation) The transmuter becomes a Medium air elemental or returns to her gnoll form. As an elemental, she has a fly Speed of 60 feet, her movement doesn't trigger reactions, and the only Strike she can make is an agile gust Strike (which deals 3d8+5 bludgeoning damage plus Knockdown). She can't cast spells in this form. Drain Bonded Item Free Action (Arcane) Frequency once per day; Requirements The transmuter hasn't acted yet on this turn; Effect During this turn, the transmuter can cast one prepared spell she has already cast, without spending a spell slot.
